regen.absent_element: reestablishment of call by driver in non-lead cab
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow a driver in a non-lead cab to initiate a request to the lead driver for reestablishment of the call if it fails.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
